text: g of the Halls of Amenti. We will give you an idea of what to expect and when, and how each of you can best prepare for the future you prefer to expe- rience. As previously mentioned, there is a schedule of events that the Guardians have to follow to ensure the opening of the Halls of Amenti. Tim- ing of these events is crucial to the success of Amenti opening and so far everything is right on schedule. 184
